pages.text: $(li)Seals are passive mostly aquatic mammals that can be foud on the Beaches and Icebergs.$(br)$(li)If one Seal is attacked, the entire bob will flee into the water.$(br)$(li)You can drop fish near of them, with 3 fish, the Seal will give you something to you in exchange.
They are the main prey of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Orcas$(/l).
